item.title: Best Places To Stay in Labuan bajo
item.dc:creator: Viar
item.description:
Labuan Bajo offers a variety of places to stay and is the gateway to Komodo National Park. Although getting to this region is a bit of a hassle, the wild Komodo dragons, stunning views and the incredible diving sites, a trip to Komodo is worthwhile in any case. item.title: Best Restaurants Labuan Bajo
item.dc:creator: Viar
item.description:
Labuan Bajo offers a diverse range of excellent restaurants. Here we present a handpicked selection of, what we think, are the best restaurants in town. From Sushi to traditional Italian pizza, Labuan Bajo’s dining scene leaves no culinary wish unfulfilled. Enjoy delicious food and visit these place before you embark on your private yacht charter […]

item.title: 8 Best Sites on a Lombok Flores Boat Trip
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description:
The journey from the Gili Islands to Flores on one of our boat trips is packed with spectacular landscape, secluded beaches and a beautiful underwater world that will leave you speechless. Starting your trip on the Gillis and cruising east is an adventure and unique experience. The route is the perfect way to discover the […]

item.title: Best Dives Sites Raja Ampat
item.dc:creator: Viar
item.description:
Best Dives Sites Raja Ampat Raja Ampat is the Amazon of the Ocean among the diving destinations of the world and on every divers wish list. The marine life diversity found in West Papua is greater than in any of the areas that comprise the Coral Triangle. Miraculous diving sites await you in the pinnacle […]

item.title: Cruising remote Islands: How to visit a Local Indonesian Village.
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description:
The Indonesian Archipelago offers a lot when it comes to Cruising remote Islands: Worldclass Scuba Diving in Komodo, breathtaking landscapes of Raja Ampat and pristine white sand beaches in South Lomboks’ Gilis – to just name a few. Sometimes, authentic experiences such as visiting a small local village make the trip all so worthwhile and […]

item.description:
Barefoot Yachts Indonesia is proud to finally present a unique alternative of Cruising Gili Islands, Lombok, Bali, Lembongan and beyond. This brand new Trimaran is the latest member in our liveaboard fleet. This modern version of an local outrigger canoe, defiantly a eye-catcher! The Trimaran Yacht boasts a Lateen Ancilliary sail.
